thread.title: Cheparliamo

author: Cheparliamo
title: Cheparliamo
text: Hammer toes and fallen metatarsals make walking difficult for me and I'm too old for corrective surgery. These shoes with thick socks let me walk around the house in comfort and I can use my orthotics with them which I can't with ordinary slippers. I plan to order another pair. Somehow they are not good for hard sidewalks, but OK for wooden floors Please keep them in stock.
